Indu.Description:
Indurate Fitness was the first project we made, it is a mobile application for android made with Android Studio.
This app is a fitness application which you can use to keep track of your workouts and to share them with your fellow fitness enthousiats.
Another function of the app is to keep track of your progress and the weights you used during the exercises.
If you want to take a look at the app yourself download it via the link underneath.
